DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate long term safety efficacy GSP 301 NS compare 2 placebo NS formulation treatment perennial allergic rhinitis ( patient 12 year age old )
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Safety Efficacy Fixed Dose Combination GSP 301 Nasal Spray ( NS ) Treatment Perennial Allergic Rhinitis ( PAR )
